entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
